name: Tartle's Penguin Bowling
description:
Penguins "Pinguins" are on a lane of ice and you have to bowl them over with a giant snowball.

Aim the ball like a slingshot. Use arrow keys to add some spin on the ball to aim. Now featuring even more walrus and more narwhal than ever before!!! You have to see it to believe it. Warning: may contain exploding penguins.

The desktop version has improved graphics that you wont find in the mobile version.
